sqlMap.update: Update HP_DBA01.HP1D003T set DATA_TYPE_NM=#DATA_TYPE_NM# where PID=#PID# and DATA_TYPE=#DATA_TYPE#
sqlMap.insert: Insert into HP_DBA01.HP1D003T (PID, DATA_TYPE_NM, DATA_TYPE) values(#PID# , #DATA_TYPE_NM# , #DATA_TYPE# )
sqlMap.update: Update HP_DBA01.HP1D004T set DATA_TYPE_NM=#DATA_TYPE_NM# where ORG_CD=#ORG_CD# and COMPANY_CD=#COMPANY_CD# and DATA_TYPE=#DATA_TYPE#
sqlMap.insert: Insert into HP_DBA01.HP1D004T (ORG_CD, DATA_TYPE_NM, COMPANY_CD, DATA_TYPE) values(#ORG_CD# , #DATA_TYPE_NM# , #COMPANY_CD# , #DATA_TYPE# )
sqlMap.select: SELECT ( COMPANY_CD || ORG_CD ) AS ITEM_CD ,ORG_NM ITEM_NM FROM HP1DM03T WHERE ORG_LVL =2 AND ACTIVE_FLAG='0' ORDER BY COMPANY_CD
SELECT DATA_TYPE ITEM_CD, DATA_TYPE ITEM_NM FROM HP1AU03T WHERE AUTH_CD=#AUTH_CD# AND CD_TYPE='DTYPE'

SELECT CD AS ITEM_CD, NM_EN AS ITEM_NM, ROWID FROM HP1M101T WHERE 1 = 1 AND CD_TYPE = 'DATA_TYPE' AND CD NOT IN('LMP','MP','MTP')
UNION
SELECT C.DATA_TYPE ITEM_CD, C.DATA_TYPE || (SELECT '(' || B.DATA_TYPE_NM || ')' AS DATA_TYPE_NM FROM HP1AU03T A, HP1D003T B WHERE B.PID = #PID# AND B.DATA_TYPE = C.DATA_TYPE AND A.DATA_TYPE = B.DATA_TYPE AND A.AUTH_CD = C.AUTH_CD AND A.CD_TYPE = 'DTYPE') AS ITEM_NM, ROWID FROM HP1AU03T C WHERE AUTH_CD = #AUTH_CD# AND CD_TYPE = 'DTYPE' ORDER BY ROWID
SELECT C.DATA_TYPE ITEM_CD, C.DATA_TYPE AS ITEM_NM FROM HP1AU03T C WHERE AUTH_CD = #AUTH_CD# AND CD_TYPE = 'FCSTA'

SELECT C.DATA_TYPE ITEM_CD, C.DATA_TYPE || (SELECT '(' || B.DATA_TYPE_NM || ')' AS DATA_TYPE_NM FROM HP1AU03T A, HP1D003T B WHERE B.PID = #PID# AND B.DATA_TYPE = C.DATA_TYPE AND A.DATA_TYPE = B.DATA_TYPE AND A.AUTH_CD = C.AUTH_CD AND A.CD_TYPE = 'DTYPE') AS ITEM_NM FROM HP1AU03T C WHERE AUTH_CD = #AUTH_CD# AND CD_TYPE = 'DTYPE'
SELECT C.DATA_TYPE ITEM_CD, C.DATA_TYPE AS ITEM_NM FROM HP1AU03T C WHERE AUTH_CD = #AUTH_CD# AND CD_TYPE = 'FCSTA'

SELECT CD AS ITEM_CD, NM_EN AS ITEM_NM, ROWID FROM HP1M101T WHERE 1 = 1 AND CD_TYPE = 'DATA_TYPE' AND CD NOT IN('A.DCP','P.DCP','T.DCP','M.DCP','E.DCP')
UNION
SELECT C.DATA_TYPE ITEM_CD, C.DATA_TYPE || (SELECT '(' || B.DATA_TYPE_NM || ')' AS DATA_TYPE_NM FROM HP1AU03T A, HP1D004T B WHERE 1=1 AND B.DATA_TYPE = C.DATA_TYPE AND A.DATA_TYPE = B.DATA_TYPE AND B.COMPANY_CD = #COMPANY_CD# AND B.ORG_CD = #ORG_CD# AND A.AUTH_CD = C.AUTH_CD AND A.CD_TYPE = 'DTYPE') AS ITEM_NM, ROWID FROM HP1AU03T C WHERE AUTH_CD = #AUTH_CD# AND CD_TYPE = 'DTYPE' ORDER BY ROWID

SELECT C.DATA_TYPE ITEM_CD, C.DATA_TYPE || (SELECT '(' || B.DATA_TYPE_NM || ')' AS DATA_TYPE_NM FROM HP1AU03T A, HP1D004T B WHERE 1=1 AND B.DATA_TYPE = C.DATA_TYPE AND A.DATA_TYPE = B.DATA_TYPE AND B.COMPANY_CD = #COMPANY_CD# AND B.ORG_CD = #ORG_CD# AND A.AUTH_CD = C.AUTH_CD AND A.CD_TYPE = 'DTYPE') AS ITEM_NM FROM HP1AU03T C WHERE AUTH_CD = #AUTH_CD# AND CD_TYPE = 'DTYPE'

SELECT COUNT(*) AS CNT FROM( SELECT Y.USER_ID, X.ORG_LVL_4 FROM ( SELECT COMPANY_CD, ORG_CD, SUBSTR (ORG_SEQ, 0, 8) || '00' AS ORG_LVL_4 FROM HP1DM03T WHERE COMPANY_CD || ORG_CD = (SELECT OWNER_COMPANY_CD||OWNER_ORG_CD FROM HP1DM01T WHERE PID = #PID# ) ) X , ( SELECT A.USER_ID, B.COMPANY_CD, B.ORG_CD, SUBSTR(B.ORG_SEQ, 0,8)||'00' AS ORG_LVL_4 FROM US0M001T_V01 A, HP1DM03T B WHERE A.USER_ID = #USER_ID# AND A.COMPANY_INFO_CODE = B.COMPANY_CD AND A.OFFICE_CODE = B.ORG_CD ) Y WHERE X.ORG_LVL_4 = Y.ORG_LVL_4)
SELECT '0' AS CNT FROM DUAL

SELECT COUNT(*) AS CNT FROM( SELECT Y.USER_ID, X.ORG_LVL_4 FROM ( SELECT COMPANY_CD, ORG_CD, SUBSTR (ORG_SEQ, 0, 8) || '00' AS ORG_LVL_4 FROM HP1DM03T WHERE COMPANY_CD || ORG_CD = #COMPANY_CD#||#ORG_CD# ) X , ( SELECT A.USER_ID, B.COMPANY_CD, B.ORG_CD, SUBSTR(B.ORG_SEQ, 0,8)||'00' AS ORG_LVL_4 FROM US0M001T_V01 A, HP1DM03T B WHERE A.USER_ID = #USER_ID# AND A.COMPANY_INFO_CODE = B.COMPANY_CD AND A.OFFICE_CODE = B.ORG_CD ) Y WHERE X.ORG_LVL_4 = Y.ORG_LVL_4)
SELECT '0' AS CNT FROM DUAL

SELECT ORG_CD FROM HP1DM03T WHERE ORG_SEQ LIKE (SELECT SUBSTR ( ORG_SEQ, 0, (SELECT ORG_LVL * 2 FROM HP1DM03T WHERE COMPANY_CD = AZ.COMPANY_CD AND ORG_CD = AZ.ORG_CD)) FROM HP1DM03T AZ WHERE AZ.COMPANY_CD = #COMPANY_CD# AND AZ.ORG_CD = #ORG_CD#)|| '%' AND COMPANY_CD=#COMPANY_CD#

SELECT MAX ( DATA_TYPE) AS DATA_TYPE FROM HP2D002T_TZ WHERE 1 = 1 AND USE_COMPANY_CD = #USE_COMPANY_CD# AND USE_ORG_CD = #USE_ORG_CD#
AND DATA_TYPE LIKE #FROM# ||'%' AND DATA_TYPE LIKE #FROM# ||'%' AND LENGTH(DATA_TYPE) = 7 AND DATA_TYPE LIKE #FROM# ||'%' AND LENGTH(DATA_TYPE) = 8
AND VAL_TYPE = 0

SELECT #TO# AS DATA_TYPE, PID, USE_COMPANY_CD, USE_ORG_CD, REQ_COMPANY_CD, REQ_ORG_CD, HPMS_ID, INVEST_TYPE_CD, APPLICATION, ITEM_NAME, CUSTOMER_CD, YYYYMM, UNIT, VAL, UPDATE_TIME, UPDATE_USER_ID, UPLOAD_FILE_NAME FROM HP2D002T_TZ WHERE 1=1 AND USE_COMPANY_CD = #USE_COMPANY_CD# AND USE_ORG_CD = #USE_ORG_CD# AND DATA_TYPE = #DATA_TYPE# AND VAL_TYPE = 0
sqlMap.delete: Delete from HP_DBA01.HP2D001T where CUSTOMER_CD=#CUSTOMER_CD# and INVEST_TYPE_CD=#INVEST_TYPE_CD# and PID=#PID# and YYYYMM=#YYYYMM# and ITEM_NAME=#ITEM_NAME# and REQ_ORG_CD=#REQ_ORG_CD# and APPLICATION=#APPLICATION# and REQ_COMPANY_CD=#REQ_COMPANY_CD# and HPMS_ID=#HPMS_ID# and USE_ORG_CD=#USE_ORG_CD# and DATA_TYPE=#DATA_TYPE# and USE_COMPANY_CD=#USE_COMPANY_CD#
sqlMap.select: SELECT DATA_TYPE , PID, USE_COMPANY_CD, USE_ORG_CD, REQ_COMPANY_CD, REQ_ORG_CD, HPMS_ID, INVEST_TYPE_CD, APPLICATION, ITEM_NAME, CUSTOMER_CD, YYYYMM, UNIT, VAL, UPDATE_TIME, UPDATE_USER_ID, UPLOAD_FILE_NAME FROM HP2D002T_TZ WHERE 1 = 1 AND USE_COMPANY_CD = #USE_COMPANY_CD# AND USE_ORG_CD = #USE_ORG_CD# AND DATA_TYPE =#FROM# AND VAL_TYPE = 0
sqlMap.insert: Insert into HP_DBA01.HP2D001T (CUSTOMER_CD, UNIT, PID, APPLICATION, HPMS_ID, UPDATE_TIME, INVEST_TYPE_CD, VAL, YYYYMM, UPDATE_USER_ID, REQ_ORG_CD, ITEM_NAME, REQ_COMPANY_CD, USE_ORG_CD, DATA_TYPE, USE_COMPANY_CD) values(#CUSTOMER_CD# , #UNIT# , #PID# , #APPLICATION# , #HPMS_ID# , SYSDATE, #INVEST_TYPE_CD# , #VAL# , #YYYYMM# , #UPDATE_USER_ID# , #REQ_ORG_CD# , #ITEM_NAME# , #REQ_COMPANY_CD# , #USE_ORG_CD# , #DATA_TYPE# , #USE_COMPANY_CD# )

sqlMap.select: SELECT DATA_TYPE, PID, USE_COMPANY_CD, USE_ORG_CD, REQ_COMPANY_CD, REQ_ORG_CD, HPMS_ID, INVEST_TYPE_CD, APPLICATION, ITEM_NAME, CUSTOMER_CD, YYYYMM, UNIT, VAL, UPDATE_TIME, UPDATE_USER_ID, UPLOAD_FILE_NAME FROM HP2D001T WHERE 1=1 AND USE_COMPANY_CD = #USE_COMPANY_CD# AND USE_ORG_CD = #USE_ORG_CD# AND DATA_TYPE = #FROM#
sqlMap.insert: Insert into HP_DBA01.HP2D001T (CUSTOMER_CD, UNIT, PID, APPLICATION, HPMS_ID, UPDATE_TIME, INVEST_TYPE_CD, VAL, YYYYMM, UPDATE_USER_ID, REQ_ORG_CD, ITEM_NAME, REQ_COMPANY_CD, USE_ORG_CD, DATA_TYPE, USE_COMPANY_CD) values(#CUSTOMER_CD# , #UNIT# , #PID# , #APPLICATION# , #HPMS_ID# , SYSDATE, #INVEST_TYPE_CD# , #VAL# , #YYYYMM# , #UPDATE_USER_ID# , #REQ_ORG_CD# , #ITEM_NAME# , #REQ_COMPANY_CD# , #USE_ORG_CD# , #DATA_TYPE# , #USE_COMPANY_CD# )
sqlMap.select: SELECT #FROM#||'_'|| MAX (APPROVAL_YYYYMMDD) AS DATA_TYPE FROM HP2D002T_TZ WHERE 1 = 1 AND USE_COMPANY_CD = #USE_COMPANY_CD# AND USE_ORG_CD = #USE_ORG_CD# AND DATA_TYPE LIKE #FROM# ||'%' AND VAL_TYPE = 0

sqlMap.insert: Insert into HP_DBA01.HP2D001T (CUSTOMER_CD, UNIT, PID, APPLICATION, HPMS_ID, UPDATE_TIME, INVEST_TYPE_CD, VAL, YYYYMM, UPDATE_USER_ID, REQ_ORG_CD, ITEM_NAME, REQ_COMPANY_CD, USE_ORG_CD, DATA_TYPE, USE_COMPANY_CD) values(#CUSTOMER_CD# , #UNIT# , #PID# , #APPLICATION# , #HPMS_ID# , SYSDATE, #INVEST_TYPE_CD# , #VAL# , #YYYYMM# , #UPDATE_USER_ID# , #REQ_ORG_CD# , #ITEM_NAME# , #REQ_COMPANY_CD# , #USE_ORG_CD# , #DATA_TYPE# , #USE_COMPANY_CD# )

SELECT DATA_TYPE, PID, USE_COMPANY_CD, USE_ORG_CD, REQ_COMPANY_CD, REQ_ORG_CD, HPMS_ID, INVEST_TYPE_CD, APPLICATION, ITEM_NAME, CUSTOMER_CD, YYYYMM, UNIT, VAL, UPDATE_TIME, UPDATE_USER_ID, UPLOAD_FILE_NAME FROM HP2D002T_TZ WHERE 1 = 1 AND DATA_TYPE =#DATA_TYPE# AND PID = #PID# AND VAL_TYPE=0

sqlMap.select: SELECT DATA_TYPE, PID, USE_COMPANY_CD, USE_ORG_CD, REQ_COMPANY_CD, REQ_ORG_CD, HPMS_ID, INVEST_TYPE_CD, APPLICATION, ITEM_NAME, CUSTOMER_CD, YYYYMM, UNIT, VAL, UPDATE_TIME, UPDATE_USER_ID, UPLOAD_FILE_NAME FROM HP2D001T WHERE 1=1 AND (PID=#PID# OR PID IN (SELECT SUB_PID FROM HP1DM02T WHERE PID = #PID#) ) AND DATA_TYPE = #TO#

sqlMap.select: SELECT max(DATA_TYPE) AS DATA_TYPE FROM HP2D002T_TZ WHERE 1 = 1 AND DATA_TYPE LIKE #DATA_TYPE# || '%' AND (PID = #PID# OR PID IN (SELECT SUB_PID FROM HP1DM02T WHERE PID = #PID#)) AND VAL_TYPE=0

SELECT #TO# AS DATA_TYPE, PID, USE_COMPANY_CD, USE_ORG_CD, REQ_COMPANY_CD, REQ_ORG_CD, HPMS_ID, INVEST_TYPE_CD, APPLICATION, ITEM_NAME, CUSTOMER_CD, YYYYMM, UNIT, VAL, UPDATE_TIME, UPDATE_USER_ID, UPLOAD_FILE_NAME FROM HP2D002T_TZ WHERE 1 = 1 and VAL_TYPE=0 AND( PID = #PID# or PID IN (SELECT SUB_PID FROM HP1DM02T WHERE PID = #PID#)) AND DATA_TYPE = #DATA_TYPE#
